s3015: Year 22: Destroyed Yu and Guo. Chong Er fled to Di.
s3030: Year 32: Led the feudal lords to attack Zheng.
s3031: Year 23: Yi Wu fled to Liang.
s3033: Year 18: Attacked Xu; the Xu ruler bare-chested apologized; Chu followed it.
s3060: Year 25: Xiang Wang was established; feared Tai Shu.
s3063: Year 25: Attacked Di, because of Chong Er.
s3066: Year 30: The duke was ill; Crown Prince Zi Fu yielded to elder brother Mu Yi's worthiness; the duke did not listen.
s3077: Year 9: Qi led us to attack Jin's chaos, reached Gao Liang and returned.
s3078: Year 35: Summer, assembled the feudal lords at Kui Qiu. The Son of Heaven sent Steward Kong to grant the thigh meat, commanded no bowing.
s3079: Year 26: The duke died; established Xi Qi; Li Ke killed him. And Zhuo Zi. Established Yi Wu.
s3080: Year 9: Yi Wu sent Xi Rang to bribe and seek entry.
s3082: Year 31: The duke died; not yet buried, Qi Huan assembled at Kui Qiu.
s3094: Year 36: Sent Xi Peng to establish Jin Hui Gong.
s3096: Year 10: Pi Zheng Zi Bao fled and came.
s3108: Year 3: The Rong attacked us; Tai Shu Dai summoned them. Wanted to execute Shu Dai; Shu Dai fled to Qi.
s3112: Year 11: Saved the king and attacked the Rong; the Rong left.
s3119: Year 24: Had a concubine who dreamed Heaven gave her orchids; gave birth to Mu Gong Lan.
s3126: Year 38: Sent Guan Zhong to pacify the Rong in Zhou; wished to use upper minister ritual, declined and received lower minister.
s3142: Year 39: Sent Zhong Sun to request the king, spoke about Shu Dai; the king was angry.
s3143: Year 4: Famine; requested grain; Qin gave to us.
s3144: Year 13: Pi Bao wanted not to give; the duke did not listen; transported Jin grain; rose from Yong to Jiang.
s3159: Year 5: Qin had famine; requested grain; Jin violated the agreement.
s3173: Year 15: Fifth month, there was a solar eclipse. Not recorded; the historians omitted it.
s3175: Year 6: Qin captured Hui Gong and re-established him.
s3176: Year 15: Used bandits who ate good horses to defeat Jin.
s3190: Year 42: The king reported Rong invasion to Qi; Qi summoned the feudal lords to defend Zhou.
s3191: Year 7: Chong Er heard Guan Zhong died; left Di and went to Qi.
